title: ROBOCAT 02 II DUO / PI JUDGEMENT DAYS _XxX_TURBO_XxX_ EDITION DX
description: An OUYA-exclusive remastered version of a previously released co-op twin-stick platforming rogue-lite. ROBOCAT 02 II DUO / PI JUDGEMENT DAYS _XxX_TURBO_XxX_ EDITION DX is a tough-as-nails twinstick shooter platformer with randomly generated elements! Walk on and around walls to take cover from enemies! Experiment with different combinations of weapons, ammunition, and upgrades!
